TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabControl extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 管理一組相關的索引標籤頁。

span.span: Manages a related set of tab pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含索引標籤頁，都由物件，您透過加入屬性。A contains tab pages, which are represented by objects that you add through the property. 此集合中的索引標籤頁的順序會反映在索引標籤控制項中顯示的順序。The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control. 使用者可以變更目前按一下其中一個控制項中的索引標籤。The user can change the current by clicking one of the tabs in the control. 您可以也以程式設計方式變更目前使用下列其中一種屬性：You can also programmatically change the current by using one of the following properties: - - 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，您也可以使用下列方法之一：In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can also use one of the following methods: - - 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，目前的索引標籤變更處理下列事件之一時，您可以回應：In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you can respond when the current tab changes by handling one of the following events: - - - - 中的索引標籤屬於，但不是個別的一部份控制項。The tabs in a are part of the , but not parts of the individual controls. 成員類別，例如屬性，會影響僅用戶端矩形的索引標籤頁，但不是索引標籤。Members of the class, such as the property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs. 此外，方法的會隱藏 [] 索引標籤。若要隱藏索引標籤，您必須移除控制項從集合。Additionally, the method of the will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the control from the collection. 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，[索引標籤被視為屬於] 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時和事件發生。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，並事件的不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但只當焦點進入或離開用戶端矩形的索引標籤頁。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 下列事件不會引發類別，除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動 索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動內索引標籤頁，引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 中所包含的控制項之前顯示的索引標籤頁，且才會顯示索引標籤頁，在這些控制項中的任何資料繫結會啟動，不會建立。Controls contained in a are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown. 當啟用視覺化樣式時，而以外的其他屬性設定為值，索引標籤內容可能無法正確呈現。When visual styles are enabled, and the property is set to a value other than , the tab contents might not render correctly. 若要解決此問題，您可以繪製索引標籤內容自行使用主控描繪。To work around this issue, you can paint the tab contents yourself using owner drawing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用 TabControl 顯示對齊側邊](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-side-aligned-tabs-with-tabcontrol.md)。For more information, see [How to: Display Side-Aligned Tabs with TabControl](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-side-aligned-tabs-with-tabcontrol.md). 當以外的其他屬性設定為值而以外的其他屬性設定為值，索引標籤頁面內容可能無法正確呈現。When the property is set to a value other than and the property is set to a value other than , the tab page contents might not render correctly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用 Visual Studio Windows Form 設計工具建立與三個索引標籤頁。The following code example uses the Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer to create a with three tab pages. 每個索引標籤頁包含數個控制項。Each tab page contains several controls. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為或，則屬性會自動設為`true`。When the property is set to or , the property is automatically set to `true`. 當您設定屬性，以，它只會顯示為這類時屬性設定為。When you set the property to , it only appears as such when the property is set to . 否則，請屬性會顯示如同設值。Otherwise, the property displays as if set to the value. 當您設定屬性，以，您也必須設定屬性設以便正確顯示的按鈕。When you set the property to , you must also set the property to so that the buttons display correctly. > [!NOTE] > 當您設定屬性，以`Buttons`，您也必須設定屬性設`Top`以便正確顯示索引標籤頁面內容。When you set the property to `Buttons`, you must also set the property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly. 此外，當啟用視覺化樣式，而以外的其他屬性設定為值，索引標籤內容可能無法正確呈現。Additionally, when visual styles are enabled, and the property is set to a value other than , the tab contents may not render correctly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立具有三個物件。The following code example creates a with three objects. 屬性設定為`Left`，其中將放置的索引標籤`tabControl1`左邊。The property is set to `Left`, which positions the tabs of `tabControl1` on the left side. remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的索引標籤中的變更時，依下列順序發生下列事件。When the current tab changes in a , the following events occur in the following order. - - - - 這些事件可讓您執行工作，例如取消索引標籤變更，如果處於無效狀態，或更新的新顯示狀態。These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed . 目前的索引標籤變更當使用者按一下索引標籤上，當您呼叫或是方法，或是變更的值時或屬性。The current tab changes when the user clicks a tab, when you call the or method, or when you change the value of the or property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`TabControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TabControl1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是主要用於開發為全球的對象的表單。The property is primarily useful for developing forms for worldwide audiences. 許多容器的設計，讓控制項的配置容器中以左到右的方式。Many containers are designed so that controls are laid out in the container in a left-to-right fashion. 這些容器是與這個方向書寫的語言相容。These containers are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction. 不過，當您從右至左的語言的使用者顯示相同的容器，最好是通常在表單上控制項的順序相反。However, when you display the same containers to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form. 如果兩個並屬性是`true`，鏡像將會開啟容器和控制項的位置，而文字流向都將由右至左。If both the and properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the container and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left. 變更這個屬性的值會引發事件。Changing the value of this property raises the event. 如需有關全球化問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[開發世界性的應用程式的最佳作法](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md)。For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的索引標籤中的變更時，依下列順序發生下列事件。When the current tab changes in a , the following events occur in the following order. - - - - 這些事件可讓您執行工作，例如取消索引標籤變更，如果處於無效狀態，或更新的新顯示狀態。These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed . 目前的索引標籤變更當使用者按一下索引標籤上，當您呼叫或是方法，或是變更的值時或屬性。The current tab changes when the user clicks a tab, when you call the or method, or when you change the value of the or property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`TabControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TabControl1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
